Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ke kaloku bamangaliseka kukuba kufike uMlumkisi kubo ephuma phakathi kwabo, yaye abangakholwayo bathi: “Yinto engumnqa le
Sisakuba sifile sele siluthuli, (siza kuphinda sibuyiselwe ebomini)? Oko kukubuyela (emhlabeni) okukude.”
Siyakwazi okwabo okugqitywa ngumhlaba, yaye kuThi kukho iNcwadi elondoloziweyo
Kodwa bona bayiphikile inyaniso isakuba ifikile kubo. Ngoko ke bakwimo yokudideka
Abajonganga na ezulwini ngentla kwabo ukuba Salakha njani, Salihombisa nokulihombisa kwanokuba kukanjani na ukungabi nazintanda kwalo
Kanti nomhlaba Siwandlalile Sabeka iintaba ezimile ngokuqinileyo Senza kwahluma apho kuwo (umhlaba) neentlobo zezinto ezintle
Ezinika ukhanyiselo, nesikhumbuzi kuye wonke osisicaka esibuyelayo (kuAllâh)
Kananjalo Sithobe imvula esikelelekileyo isuka esibhakabhakeni Senza ngayo kwahluma izitiya neenkozo ezivela kwisivuno
Nemithi emide yesundu ineziqhamo ezicwangciswe ngokwemiqolo eyalekeneyo
Umsindleko wezicaka (zika-Allâh), kananjalo Sinike ubomi ngayo (imvula) emhlabeni ofileyo. Lunjalo ke uvuko (lwabafileyo)
Abantu bakwaNûh baphika ngaphambili kunabo nabemi baseRassi1 nabakwaThamûd
Nabemi basezinkunini nabantu baseTubba’, ngamnye kubo wamphika uMthunywa wabo, saza isilumkiso saM sehla (phezu kwabo) ke
Ingaba Sasilela kwindalo yokuqala kusini na? Kodwa basekudidekeni ngokuphathelene nendalo entsha
